body:
Hello {{RECIPIENT_NAME}},

My name is Chinmay Shringi. I understand your time is valuable, so I’ll keep it brief. I am:

	- A full-stack developer with over 5 years of industry experience.
	- Currently pursuing a Master’s in Computer Engineering at NYU.

I am interested in the Software Engineer Intern position at SingleStore because:

	- I am excited about the opportunity to work with real-time technologies that are revolutionizing how companies operate every day.
	- I admire SingleStore's emphasis on rapid production, end-to-end project ownership, and the collaborative work environment that fosters innovation.

Thank you for considering my application. I would be thrilled to discuss how I could contribute to your team.

Best regards,
Chinmay Shringi
+1(201) 284-0211
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/chinmay-shringi-105736173/
GitHub: https://github.com/ChinmayShringi
My Website: https://chinmayshringi.web.app/
subject: Collaboration Opportunities at SingleStore
